title: iNaiyillAt-tuNaivanAi
sahitya:
iNaiyillAt-tuNaivanAi irukkirAn murugan taNikai tanil tanait-tEDip-paNivOrkk-ellAm


anupallavi

  vaNangiDat-tanniDam vandiDum aDiyArin vAzhvini orupOdum tAzhvurAdu tAngum


caraNam    paNam tEDa mighap-pADupaTTadu pOdumE dinam kaNa nEramEnum tan kazhalaDi tozhudiDum
anaivarum inimEl allalEdum urAmal aNaittu aLavillA inbattai aLikkum
